name: Gogol
description:
Slightly unfinished shump inspired by Nikolai Gogol's story Viy.

Made for Ludum dare 37 "One room".

Controls: space-bar to shoot, arrow keys to move

Features:

- Camera shake!

- Cool bosses (I hope so).

- Different weapons.

- Pretty hardcore.

Warning: no interface. Also may contain some bugs.

Post-LD edit: *Fixed critical bug with waves not coming.
